scripts.compile: asc lib/asmain.ts --lib ./graphs/$ZKG -t build/$ZKG.wat -O --noAssert -o build/$ZKG.wasm --disable bulk-memory --use abort=lib/asmain/abort --target release --bindings esm --runtime stub && wc -l build/$ZKG.wat
scripts.compile-zk: asc lib/zkmain.ts --lib ./graphs/$ZKG -t build/$ZKG.wat -O --noAssert -o build/$ZKG.wasm --disable bulk-memory --use abort=lib/zkmain/abort --target release --bindings esm --runtime stub && wc -l build/$ZKG.wat
scripts.test-sdk: asc sdk/test/test.ts -o build/sdk/test.wasm --bindings esm && node sdk/test/test.js
